thread.title: Tennis legend Roger Federer playing a pair of 'air bongos' is pure dorky joy
thread.title_full: Tennis legend Roger Federer playing a pair of 'air bongos' is pure dorky joy

author: Johnny Lieu
title: Tennis legend Roger Federer playing a pair of 'air bongos' is pure dorky joy
text:
When you're a legend of the game, like tennis player Roger Federer, you can do anything you want without feeling like a dork.
Even on the very public and potentially embarrassing "Bongo Cam" at the Hopman Cup in Perth, Australia.
SEE ALSO: Serena Williams trolls fans with a taco engagement ring
It's your standard fan cam, but with a pair of superimposed graphic bongos that the crowd can pretend to play with. Federer is of course more than happy to play along, as Gloria Estefan's "Conga" blasts in the background.
It's one of those moments that's ordinarily kinda lame, but because he's a 17-time Grand Slam winner ‚Äî it's actually the best thing ever.
When that beat drops, feat. @rogerfederer and Alexander Zverev... üòÇ #HopmanCup pic.twitter.com/UJNGtWrvu1
‚Äî Hopman Cup (@hopmancup) January 4, 2017
At least we know what Federer will now be doing if the whole tennis thing doesn't work out.
At least I have a backup career as a bongo player üí™üèª pic.twitter.com/C8xl0pW9Pu
‚Äî Roger Federer (@rogerfederer) January 4, 2017
Federer's dad is down with it though. He apparently texted him, telling him to stop with the air bongo antics.
Glorious Bencic/Federer on court interview.
Federer. "My father watched me playing the bongos on TV and texted telling me to stop".
‚Äî Jos√© Morgado (@josemorgado) January 4, 2017
Colour us gushing, but we really love this guy.
BONUS: Faraday Future rolls out production car, the FF 91, in rock star fashion
